name: AzureRedis
help: Access to a secure, dedicated Redis cache for your Azure applications.

properties.name: Location
properties.help: Location. You can configure the default location using `az configure --defaults location=&lt;location&gt;`.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: The primary resource name.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: Sku
properties.help: Type of Redis cache.

properties.name: VmSize
properties.help: Size of Redis cache to deploy. Example : values for C family (C0, C1, C2, C3, C4, C5, C6). For P family (P1, P2, P3, P4).

properties.name: EnableNonSslPort
properties.help: If the value is true, then the non-ssl redis server port (6379) will be enabled.

properties.name: RedisConfiguration
properties.help: JSON encoded configuration settings. Use @{file} to load from a file.

properties.name: ShardCount
properties.help: The number of shards to be created on a Premium Cluster Cache.

properties.name: StaticIp
properties.help: Required when deploying a redis cache inside an existing Azure Virtual Network.

properties.name: SubnetId
properties.help: The full resource ID of a subnet in a virtual network to deploy the redis cache in. Example format /subscriptions/{subid}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/Microsoft.{Network|ClassicNetwork}/VirtualNetworks/vnet1/subnets/subnet1.

properties.name: Tags
properties.help: Space-separated tags in 'key[=value]' format. Use "" to clear existing tags.

properties.name: TenantSettings
properties.help: Json dictionary with tenant settings.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: Name of the Redis cache.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: Container
properties.help: Container name to export to.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: Name of the Redis cache.

properties.name: Prefix
properties.help: Prefix to use for exported files.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: FileFormat
properties.help: File format to export.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: Name of the Redis cache.

properties.name: RebootType
properties.help: Which Redis node(s) to reboot. Depending on this value data loss is possible.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: ShardId
properties.help: If clustering is enabled, the ID of the shard to be rebooted.

properties.name: FileFormat
properties.help: File format to import.

properties.name: Files
properties.help: Space-separated list of files to import.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: Name of the Redis cache.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: Add
properties.help: Add an object to a list of objects by specifying a path and key value pairs.  Example: --add property.listProperty <key=value, string or JSON string>.

properties.name: Remove
properties.help: Remove a property or an element from a list.  Example: --remove property.list <indexToRemove> OR --remove propertyToRemove.

properties.name: Set
properties.help: Update an object by specifying a property path and value to set.  Example: --set property1.property2=<value>.
